Class VersionAPI

java.lang.Object

public final class VersionAPI
extends java.lang.Object

createAuthor

public static Author createAuthor(java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String email)
Creates an author to be used for setting to commits.

Parameters:
name - Author's name, NULL string is not allowed
email - Author's email, blank string is not allowed
Returns:
Author to be used with commits

createResource

public static Resource createResource(java.lang.String resourceId,
                                      java.lang.String content)
Creates resource to versioned, it could be a new version or an old resource's new version.

Parameters:
resourceId - Id for the resource, not blank
content - Content of the resource, not null
Returns:
Returns the resource

createResource

public static Resource createResource(java.lang.String resourceId,
                                      java.lang.String content,
                                      boolean deleted)
Creates resource to versioned, it could be a new version or an old resource's new version.

Parameters:
resourceId - Id for the resource, not blank
content - Content of the resource, not null
deleted - Whether the resource is deleted or not
Returns:
Returns the resource

                                      java.lang.String content,
                                      boolean deleted,
                                      java.lang.String mimeType)
Creates resource to versioned, it could be a new version or an old resource's new version.

Parameters:
resourceId - Id for the resource, not blank
content - Content of the resource, not null
deleted - Whether the resource is deleted or not
mimeType - MIME type of the resource, can be null.
Returns:
Returns the resource

createRevision

public static Revision createRevision(Resource resource,
                                      java.lang.String revisionId)
Create a revision object from the given resource and revision id.

Parameters:
resource - Resource represented in the revision, can't be null
revisionId - Id of the revision, might be null
Returns:
Revision of the resource.

createVersionedResource

public static VersionedResource createVersionedResource(java.util.Collection<Revision> revisions)
Create a versioned resource from revisions. If revisions is not empty then head revision's resource will be pointed accordingly.

Parameters:
revisions - Revisions of a resource
Returns:
VersionedResource of the revisions.

createCommit

public static Commit createCommit(java.util.Collection<Revision> revisions,
                                  java.lang.String commitId,
                                  java.lang.String parentCommitId,
                                  java.lang.String commitMessage,
                                  Author committer,
                                  java.util.Date commitTime)
It creates a commit from the given information.

Parameters:
revisions - Revisions to be part of the commit, can be empty
commitId - Id of the commit, may be null
parentCommitId - Id of the parent commit, may be null, the null signifies that its the first commit of the base, however, implementations could set it themselves if required
commitMessage - Log message for this commit, can not be blank
committer - Author of the commit, can not be null
commitTime - Time the commit was performed, may be null, can't be null if commit id is not null or not blank.
Returns:
Commit object representing the information supplied

trimToPropertResourceId

public static java.lang.String trimToPropertResourceId(java.lang.String resourceId)
Throw away all the '/' from beginning and end of the resourceId.

Parameters:
resourceId - Id to trim
Returns:
Trimmed version of the resourceId

getVersionControlWriteDao

public VersionControlWriteDao getVersionControlWriteDao()
Returns the injected RCS Writer.

Returns:
Injected from context or else null if not available.

getVersionControlReadDao

public VersionControlReadDao getVersionControlReadDao()
Returns the injected RCS Reader

Returns:
Injected from context or else null if not available
